citation: Proclamation under the Roads and Jetties Act 1935 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Roads and Jetties Act 1935

I, the Lieutenant-Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under sections 9A and 52A of the Roads and Jetties Act 1935 amend the proclamation notified in the Gazette as Statutory Rules 1994, No. 105 by –

        (a) omitting from Schedules 1 and 2 to that proclamation "3010, 3011," and "and 3016" and inserting ", 3016, 9832 and 9833" after "3015"; and
        (b) omitting the table from Schedule 3 to that proclamation and substituting the following table:
                           Location                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
        Item  Description                                                 1.  Pass Road – north side  1.32  2.  Rokeby Road – south side  1.32  3.  Rokeby Road – north-west side  3.22  4.  High Street – south-east side  3.22  5.  Droughty Point Road – south-west side  3.65  6.  The Mall – north side  4.43  7.  Acton Road – north-east side  6.68
                           (Distance in kilometres from Merindah Street)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
        
    17 November 2014

    A. M. BLOW

    Lieutenant-Governor

    By His Excellency's Command,

    M. T. (RENE) HIDDING

    Minister for Infrastructure

    Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

    Notified in the Gazette on 26 November 2014

    This proclamation is administered in the Department of State Growth.
